/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A red car is parked on the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the otherwise muted palette of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
